channel.title: Integer for money
channel.description: What in the integer for the amount of money called? I can't find it anywhere for some reason. :( I think I'm just retarded.

item.title: Integer for money
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

Yea, I’m not good with clients so i will just go back to using and int. Thanks for your help.

item.title: Integer for money
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

You need to cast it to a long.

public long maxItemAmount = (long) 5000000000;

Although I don’t recommend doing this since the client treats item amounts as integers.

Read full topic

item.title: Integer for money
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

I changed public int to public long.

[code]Integer Types

     Type      Size      Values That Can Be Stored 

      byte     8 bits    128 to 127 

      short    16 bits   32,768 to 32,767 

      int      32 bits   2,147,483,648 to 2,147,483,647 

      long     64 bits   9,223,372,036,854,775,808 to 9,223,372,036,854,775,807 [/code]

So now i make the amount 5000000000 (since long can hold higher then an int). And i get this error:

Player.java:726: integer number too large: 5000000000 public long maxItemAmount = /* 5000000000 */5000000000; ^ 1 error Finished ! Press any key to continue . . .

I know that means the number is too large. What i do not understand is why it is too large. If long can hold up to 9,223,372,036,854,775,807. Why won’t it let me do this?

Read full topic

item.title: Integer for money
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

[quote=“Darkning, post:3, topic:269111”]EDIT: I found it in my player class. I forgot to look there.

public int maxItemAmount = /* 2147000000 */2147000000;

Now i just change the 2147000000 to the max, correct?[/quote]
Yeah, I just realized it was in the Player class.
Yes, you can change it to 2147483647, or [tt]Integer.MAX_VALUE[/tt].

Read full topic
